name: Mad Planets
description:
◈ Control your hero and command your troops!
◈ You can utilize various units and defense facilities!
◈ Join a Clan and cooperate with other players!

Hello, Commander! We will reach 「Mad Planet」, a new post in Sector T505, in a moment.
Sector T505 is a war zone. Various planet commanders are fighting each other!

Your objective is to collect resources, enhance your troops, establish a Clan, and expand your territory to secure sector T505.

Features
ㆍUse 「Avatar」parts and develop your own strategy.
ㆍFace the regular army deployed by the government in single-play mode.
ㆍInvade other bases or expand your Clan territory in multi-play mode!
ㆍUpgrade your defense facilities to fend off enemy attacks.
ㆍUpgrade various units and utilize them with your Avatar to execute your plans.

Anyone can download 「Mad Planet」. It’s free to play.
Some in-game items can be purchased with real money. You can turn off the In-app Purchase feature in device settings if you wish.

Note: Network connection required.
